content:
ICT-48 RIA: Call for Participation Foundations of Trustworthy AI integrating Reasoning, Learning and Optimisation

TAILOR partner, Fintech, has a few limited spaces open for researchers that are interested in driving forward one of the three working groups and be involved in an interdisciplinary community across Europe.

COST Website:
https://www.cost.eu/actions/CA19130/#tabs|Name:overview
• Start date: September 2020
• Duration: Four years
• Participants: >150 Researchers from all over Europe and international partner
countries; Aim: 39 European Countries + 10 International Partner Countries

Research Working Groups
 Transparency in FinTech
 Transparent versus Black Box Decision-SupportModels in the Financial Industry
 Transparency into Investment Product Performance for Clients

Key tools
 Short-term Scientific Missions
 Training Schools
 Workshops and Conferences
 Interaction with policy-makers, regulators, industry and the general audience

See the slides here
20200530_COST_FinAI_exec_summary.pdf
